column4: I have a quick question, is it possible for me to make it so there can only be 1 browser window open at one time?
I have this ubuntu setup for a person with special needs and he likes to open many browser windows, he doesn't understand the concept of tabs. How can i limit him to just 1 window open.
Anyone? Is there any way to only allow 1 window run?
I dont know much about this, but I have heard that KDE has a 'kiosk mode' if you install the right package. That might give the limitations you are looking for. no promises though
